content: 1 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in last single_crochet slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain 120/132/168 double_crochet + 40/44/56 ch1-sps round 12 chain 1 doesn t count as st single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next ch1-space single_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat around to last ch1-space single_crochet in last ch1-space single_crochet in last double_crochet slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 160/176/ 224 single_crochet round 13 chain 3 skip next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around to last 3 sts skip next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in last single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain chain 1 fasten-off finishing weave in ends wet block if desired but it is not necessary thread the cord/string forth and back through the ch1-sps from round 11 and attach the lock stopper stretch the top opening a little to make sure it allows for some stretch before securing the ends see the picture below enjoy 3 reusable produce bag | © elitza chernaeva 2020 each base round is given in different color for ease of following increases are bolded for better visualization 4 reusable produce bag | © elitza chernaeva 2020 text photos and charts © elitza chernaeva / rubrac 2020 selling or distributing this pattern is not allowed this pattern is for personal use only 5 reusable produce bag | © elitza chernaeva 2020
